ind.title: Ringkas Konten
ind.prompt: Summarize the following text into 100 words, making it easy to read and comprehend. The summary should be concise, clear, and capture the main points of the text. Avoid using complex sentence structures or technical jargon. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Indonesian. Please begin by editing the following text:
ind.description: Ringkas teks berikut menjadi 100 kata, sehingga mudah dibaca dan dipahami. Hindari penggunaan struktur kalimat yang rumit atau istilah teknis.

metaDescription: Terlalu banyak dibaca? Ringkas teks apa pun menjadi 100 kata sederhana. Tangkap poin utama tanpa jargon!
